solutions.problem: WebSocket initialization error: Error: You are trying to attach socket.io to an express request handler function. Please pass a http.Server instance.
solutions.solution: Fixed by ensuring realTimeService.initializeSocketServer() is called with the http.Server instance created by http.createServer(app)

solutions.problem: Uncaught Exception: { message: 'listen EADDRINUSE: address already in use 0.0.0.0:5000'
solutions.solution: Fixed by identifying and killing the process using port 5000 using netstat and taskkill commands

solutions.problem: âš ï¸ Missing API keys: OPENAI_API_KEY, GEMINI_API_KEY, DEEPSEEK_API_KEY, ANTHROPIC_API_KEY, GROK_API_KEY
solutions.solution: Created comprehensive API key setup system with fallback configuration and graceful degradation

solutions.problem: AI team using API-first approach instead of research-first approach
solutions.solution: Implemented comprehensive research-first approach with knowledge base, web search, and minimal AI API usage

solutions.problem: Knowledge base data file not found - forcing reliance on external AI APIs
solutions.solution: Created comprehensive knowledge base with 15+ years of backend development experience

solutions.problem: Web search using mock results instead of real web search
solutions.solution: Implemented real web search service with multiple search engines and proper error handling

solutions.problem: No monitoring of research-first vs API-first approach usage
solutions.solution: Created comprehensive monitoring system to track and alert on approach usage

solutions.problem: No way to analyze why AI team uses API-first approach
solutions.solution: Created comprehensive analysis system to diagnose approach issues and provide solutions
